Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text:
Got it! Here's the 50-word summary paragraph of the people's post that I came up with:

Y'all need to chill, @nomadswife6973 @electMikeHarvey @laurenboebert! No one said California's going broke. It's only facing budget issues due to liabilities and pensions. But honestly, who isn't? The state's investing in huge infrastructures that'll bear fruit in the long run. So, let's all calm down and give California a break!
